title: Keen123 items
content:
Here started making some keen pickup sprites, feel free to use them in your mods.

[img]http://www.geocities.com/maxgenis/keen123lib9.gif[/img]

Current sprite list:
1. Teddy Keen
2. Teddy Ninja Turtles (all 4 of them)
3. Icecreams: big cone, small cone, double layer
4. Chips/French-Fries
5. Happy Meal
6. Teddy Mickey Mouse
7. Cola cans: Pepsi Cola, Coca Cola
8. Teddy Street Fighter 2: M.Bison, Balrog, Ken, Ryu, Guile, Dhalsim
9. Teddy Mortal Kombat: Scorpion, Sub Zero, Reptile
10. "Kinder Surprise" egg

I'll update this link as the time goes

title: Re: Keen123 items
content:
Um... those look pretty good.------------------------------
[url=http://shadowm2006.sitesled.com/]My website[/url]
[url=http://p072.ezboard.com/fpubliccommanderkeenforumfrm20.showMessage?topicID=12.topic]Get Windows/Linux native LModKeen 2 with integrated FIN2BMP![/url]. You know you want to.
[url=http://shadowm2006.sitesled.com/meta/projectpage.htm]The META engine for 2D games[/url].

title: Re: Keen123 items
content:
Decided to make tribute to some old DOS classics I love...and also it's logical, as those games were popular during the time of Billy Blaze and Keen, and so it's logical for Vorticons to steal those toys.

So I've added:
1. Street Fighter 2: M.Bison, Ryu, Ken, Balrog, Guile, Dhalsim
2. Mortal Kombat: Scorpion, Sub Zero, Reptile
3. Disney: Mickey Mouse

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

title: Re: Keen123 items
content:
*Steals*

Perfect stuff, even for 4-6![img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Awww! Feel the love!

title: Re: Keen123 items
content:
Difficult to see, with the harsh red-green background. But from what I could see without paining my eyes, the sprites look pretty good.____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

title: Re: Keen123 items
content:
Thanx [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

...added Happy Meal, Pepsi Cola and "Kinder Surprise" egg...also improved the french-fries a bit

title: Re: Keen123 items
content:
Looks pretty good, dude. Fitting Happy Meal in 16x16 pixels is a terrific job! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] Awesome.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."
